root: ^All right, I've been thinking, when life gives you bananas, don't make banana bread!
^I don't want your damn bananas! What am I supposed to do with these?
^Demand to see life's manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Archibald bananas! Do you know who I am?
^I'm the man whose gonna burn your house down - with the bananas!
^I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible banana that'll burn your house down!
^Burn it down! Burning people. He says what we're all thinking.
